amendment.description: To fulfill the U.S. commitment to provide health care to American Indians and Alaska Natives.

vote.text: Amendment SA 361 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 51. Record Vote Number: 87.

action.text: Amendment SA 361 proposed by Senator Daschle. (consideration: CR S4347) To fulfill the U.S. commitment to provide health care to American Indians and Alaska Natives.
